description: Impose changing concentrations of RCP Y long-lived greenhouse gases including CO2, N2O and halogenated gases.
name: RCPYWellMixedGHG
rationale: Represents a very low forcing scenario with the goal of limiting global mean warming to 1.5°C above pre-industrial levels based on the Paris COP21 agreement.
longName: Representative Concentration Pathway Y Well Mixed Greenhouse Gases
keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway Y, future, scenario, SSPx, RCPy, Well-mixed Greenhouse Gas, CO2
